notes: Alphabet spinoff (2022). AI + quantum tech company. Cybersecurity group — Cryptographic Posture Management and AI Security Posture Management products. High-growth, well-funded (T. Rowe Price, Eric Schmidt, etc). 348 on LinkedIn. NOT healthcare. Cybersecurity domain. Strong comp range up to $384K + equity.

requirements_matched: 10+ years software engineering — 20+ years experience across 5 companies

4+ years leading managers or multiple teams — Led engineering orgs at CTO/Director level for 15+ years, managed managers at MedQuest (team of 22 with QA/Product leads), Cognizant (50+ developers across countries)
Strong track record delivering complex systems — Diagnostic imaging across 100 centers (MedQuest), HIPAA-compliant platform with 99.9% uptime (ilumed), microservices transformation (Cognizant)
Experience defining and executing technical strategy — Multi-quarter roadmaps at ilumed, technology strategy at Red Spot driving 12% client growth, architectural direction at Cognizant
Excellent cross-functional communication — CTO-level stakeholder management, partnered with product/clinical/ops teams across all roles
Proven ability to scale teams and processes — Built 3 teams from zero, instituted DevOps/CI/CD practices, established engineering standards
Sound technical judgment and operational mindset — Architecture decisions across microservices, cloud, compliance; 99.9% uptime, 35% reliability improvement
AWS and Kubernetes (highly desired) — AWS integrations (Cognizant, Red Spot), Kubernetes in technical stack
CI/CD pipelines (highly desired) — Instituted CI/CD improving deployment frequency 50% (Red Spot)
Build scalable team structures and processes — Three teams from inception with hiring, culture, delivery processes
requirements_partial: Lead and develop engineering managers — Has led large teams and likely managed sub-leads/managers at MedQuest (22-person org with QA/Product) and Cognizant (50+ developers), but explicit manager-of-managers experience not prominently documented

Cybersecurity/cryptography domain — SOC2/HITRUST certification experience and HIPAA security architecture are adjacent to security posture management, but cryptographic posture management is a specialized domain
gaps: Kotlin, Golang, Rust (highly desired) — None of these in documented tech stack. Python, Java, C#, Node.js are the documented languages
Cybersecurity product domain — No direct cybersecurity product experience. Security compliance (HIPAA, SOC2) is adjacent but different from building security posture management products
addressable_gaps: Kotlin/Golang/Rust — Highly desired not required. Strong polyglot foundation (Python, Java, C#, Node.js) demonstrates language adaptability. This role is Director-level, not IC — language-specific expertise is less critical than technical judgment
DataDog — Operational monitoring tool, straightforward to adopt. Has operational mindset with 99.9% uptime achievement
Cybersecurity domain — Security compliance experience (HIPAA, SOC2/HITRUST) provides foundation for understanding security posture. The gap is product domain, not security thinking
